name: MOP Bank
description:
MOP Bank

MOP Bank is an ATM narrative experience born out of my obsession with the utopian, sterilized  nature of ATM UI/UX design. Set in a futuristic, cyberpunk world where the world populations have been split between ocean, surface, and underground, MOP Bank is a small window for the players to get an understanding of this mysterious new world. 

Designer & Artist: Ivan Tsang - website- twitter

Engineer: Ryan Stevenson - website - twitter

Sounds from Soundsnap.com
